sentences.sContent: We went through this after the Haiti earthquake, and all of the arguments which applied there apply to Japan as well.
sentences.sContent_eng: We went through this after the Haiti earthquake, and all of the arguments which applied there apply to Japan as well.
sentences.sCn: 我们在海地地震后讨论过这个，并且相信所有适用于那里的论断同样会在适用于日本。

sentences.sContent: Gratitude to the people of Haiti, for their strength, resilience and faith, the faith of human spirit, the spirit that burns in all of us today.
sentences.sContent_eng: Gratitude to the people of Haiti, for their strength, resilience and faith, the faith of human spirit, the spirit that burns in all of us today.
sentences.sCn: 我们感激海地人民，他们展现了毅力、韧劲和信念，这是人类精神信念，是今天在我们所有人心中燃烧的信念。

sentences.sContent: When something happens in Haiti or Hunan, the rest of us learn about it in real time – from real people.
sentences.sContent_eng: When something happens in Haiti or Hunan, the rest of us learn about it in real time – from real people.
sentences.sCn: 在海地或湖南发生什么情况时，我们其余的人都能从当事者那里实时得知。
